a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Monthly sea ice extent in the Arctic
Each point represents the monthly average sea ice extent. Years in the current decade are highlighted in red, with
the current year highlighted in black.
Data source: National Snow and Ice Data Center - Sea Ice Index (2024)
Note: All years have data for all 12 months, except 1987 and 1988 (each missing one month) and the current year.
